actions.committee: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

official_title: To curb wasteful spending by making 50 percent of year-end savings in salaries and expenses available for an additional fiscal year, and to use the remaining 50 percent for the purpose of deficit reduction.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Saving Over Spending Act - Allows 50% of any unobligated balance of an appropriated amount available for salaries and expenses that would otherwise expire at the end of a fiscal year to remain available for expenditure for the subsequent fiscal year and allocates the other 50% for deficit reduction.

titles.title: To curb wasteful spending by making 50 percent of year-end savings in salaries and expenses available for an additional fiscal year, and to use the remaining 50 percent for the purpose of deficit reduction.
